text.感情のまま動いてしまうのでポーカーは苦手: She's not very good at \nplaying poker, her tail \ncalls her bluff.
text.空気抵抗を減らすため手入れを欠かさない: She puts care into it to \nreduce air resistance.
text.注目されると、興奮してふぁさふぁさ振る: Waves around excitedly \nwhen she gets attention.
text.朝シャンでサラサラにするのがマイブーム: She likes to shampoo her \nhair in the morning to \nmake it smooth and silky.
text.歌劇の大羽根のように優雅に揺れる: It sways gracefully, like \na feather in an opera.
text.体が柔らかいので手入れできない場所がない: She has a soft body, so \nevery place must be \nmaintained.
text.時々部屋に忘れてくることがある（本人談）: She sometimes leaves \nit in her room (according \nto her).
text.カッコいい尻尾の揺らし方を練習している: She practices shaking it \nto look cool.
text.毎朝、癖を伸ばすため櫛で格闘している: She struggles to brush it \nevery morning.
text.整尾スプレーは仕送りしてもらっている: She has her tail spray \nmailed to her.
text.振り返らずに背後の虫を落とせる: Able to swat bugs without \nlooking behind her.
text.艶黒の毛並みは多くの生徒の憧れ: Many students admire her \nshiny black hair.
text.スポーツの話をしていると振りが激しくなる: Sways wildly when she's \ntalking about sports.
text.尻尾を掴むのは反則らしい: Grabbing her tail is an \nautomatic foul.
text.手入れしたことも気にかけたこともない: She rarely takes care of \nher tail.
text.演説の時などは毛の一本さえも迫力満点: When she's giving a \nspeech, every strand of \nhair is powerful.
text.母親と同じテールオイルを使っている: She uses the same tail \noil as her mother.
text.ライブ前は美容室で毛並みを整える: She go to the hairdresser \nto get her hair done \nbefore a live.
text.怒ると、稲妻のようにビリビリ震える: Shakes like a lightning \nbolt when she's angry.
text.王族特有の毛質。通称『ロイヤル・テール』:
She has the unique hair 
texture of royalty. 
Commonly known as a 
"Royal Tail".
text.湿気があると、服の尻尾穴に入らず苦戦する:
When it's damp, she has a 
hard time getting her 
tail into the tail hole 
of her clothes.
text.嘘をついていると激しく揺れる: It swishes around a lot \nwhen she lies.
text.なにもしなくても、しっとりサラサラ毛質: She has naturally soft \nand silky hair.
text.尻尾で立てるほどの筋力がある…との噂アリ: Rumor has it that she has \nenough strength to stand \non her own tail…
text.汗をよく掻くので尻尾用タオルを常備してる: She sweats a lot, so she \nalways has a towel for \nher tail.
text.泡立てている時は、一緒にクルクル回る: It swishes around a lot \nwhile she's whisking.
text.プチプラお手入れグッズに挑戦中: Currently trying out \nlow price care products.
text.人にぶつけないよう気を付けている: She pays attention not to \nbump it into people.
text.妹たちにいじられ慣れ、掴まれても驚かない:
Used to being played with 
by her sisters, she's 
never surprised when it 
gets grabbed.
text.なにか閃くと毛並みが逆立つ: When she gets an idea, \nher tail stands on end.
text.寝ている時、無意識に握りしめる癖がある: She has a habit of \nunconsciously clutching \nit while sleeping.
text.真夏も熱いお湯で洗うのが粋なこだわり:
Washing it with hot water 
even in the middle of 
summer is a chic 
obsession.
text.喜怒哀楽が見て取れるほどの表現力:
Expressions of joy, 
anger, grief, and 
pleasure are always 
visible.
text.走りに適した長さと毛量を計算し、維持中:
She calculates and 
maintains the appropriate 
length and hair volume 
for efficient running.
text.コンマ数ミリのズレも許さず切り揃えている: She cuts it to the \nnearest tenth of a \nmillimeter.
text.触れればトリコになるふわサラの手触り: Fluffy and silky to the \ntouch, it'll make you \nfall in love with it.
text.バクシンしていると、毛先さえも捕まらない: When shes rushing, you \ncan't even catch the tips \nof her tail.
text.海外で披露できるよう尻尾習字を習得済み: Learned callipgraphy \nwith her tail to perform \ninternationally.
text.朝起きるとよだれがついていることがある: Often has drool on it \nwhen she wakes up.
text.手懐けようとした黒猫に玩具扱いされている: The black cat she tried \nto tame is treating it \nlike a toy.
text.癖がつかないよう、座り方にも注意している:
She pays attention to how 
she sits so that she 
doesn't get in the habit 
of sitting improperly.
text.人ごみだと緊張して微動だにしない: In crowds, they get \nnervous and don't \nmove an inch.
text.不器用で枝毛をチェックできないのが悩み: She always makes sure to \ncheck for split ends.
text.賭け事の際は尻尾の動きをブラフに使う: Uses her tail movements \nas a bluff when gambling.
text.気を許した友人以外が触ると、蹴りが飛ぶ: Flicks when touched by \nanyone other than a \ntrusted friend.
text.太陽と、四季折々の花の香りがする: It smells like the sun \nand the scent of flowers \nin each season.
text.回転させると速く走れると思っていた: She thought spinning it \nwould make her go faster.
text.とりあえず尻尾も毎日鍛えている: She disciplines her tail \nevery day too.
text.マーベラスな物を発見するアンテナ☆らしい: Apparently an antenna sensitive \nto marvelous☆ things.
text.占いの最中はぴたりと止まる: Will suddenly stop moving \nduring a fortune-telling \nsession.
text.悩むといじる癖があるので、よく絡む:
She has a habit of 
fiddling with it when 
distressed, so it gets 
tangled up a lot.
text.ブランド物より毛質に合うアイテムを愛用中: She prefers products that \nsuit her hair type rather \nthan brand name products.
text.夜中にこっそり手入れしている: She takes care of it in \nthe middle of the night \nin secret.
text.自分でカットすると斜めにパッツンになる: If she cuts it herself it \nwill look like diagonally \ncut bangs.
text.他人の脚をくすぐって笑わせることがある: It sometimes tickles \nother people's legs to \nmake them laugh.
text.いつメンとハートマーク作って撮るのエモい: Loves making heart \nshapes with her friends \nfor photos.
text.落ち着きなく、あっちこっちフラフラ: Wags all over the place, \nnever staying still.
text.尻尾でも重たいものが持てる: Even her tail can hold \nheavy things.
text.マルゼンスキーと同じオイルでケアしている: Tended to with the same \noil that Maruzensky uses.
text.特注のオーガニックトリートメントを愛用: She loves to use a \ncustom-made organic \ntreatment.
text.飛来してきたものを叩き落せるほど強靭: It's strong enough to \nknock down flying objects.
text.おしりに敷いてもあんまり気づかない: She doesn't really \nnotice it when it \nlays on her hips.
text.母そっくりの毛質で、とてもふわふわ: The hair is very fluffy, \njust like her mom's.
text.湿気で少し広がるのを気にしている: She's a little self-conscious about it \npuffing up slightly in high humidity.
text.概念に抗え――（※尻尾でも柵を壊したい）: Reject convention―― \n(※ Has a desire to destroy fences)
text.毛先は自然と高貴な形に巻いている: The hairtips naturally curl \nthemselves into classy shapes.
text.いつでも滑らかな流線形: Always seen in a velvety smooth, \nstreamlined shape.
text.グッズ化したときに映えるアレンジを模索中: Looking for a style that \nwill look good in merch.
text.サトノ系列ホテル御用達品を取り寄せている: She orders the products favored \nby hotels under the Satono Group.
text.妹からよく勝手に三つ編みにされていた: Her sister would often braid \nit without asking.
text.その日の吉方位に向かってパタパタしがち: It tends to flutter \ntowards the luckiest \ndirection of the day.
text.触られそうでも華麗にかわす: Elegantly slips away from \nany touching attempts.
text.調子が悪いと“ダストテイル”になるらしい: Apparently turns into a dust tail \nwhen she feels down.
text.染めてみるか…と思ったことだけはある: She has found herself thinking \n"Maybe I should dye it..."
text.ダンスで映えるようにオイルケアしている: Treated with oils to look \nattractive when dancing.
